name: FotozoneAR:Back to Jurassic
description:
Fotozone AR is the exclusive APP that comes with the arcade game.

Download and install the APP, use the built-in AR scan function to scan Fotozone photos and the dinosaurs can be shown on the screen, you can control dinosaur to walk, roar, and take photo with the favorite dinosaurs.

The APP also contains the dinosaur knowledge of encyclopedia, will be able to seen different knowledge of dinosaurs, the more frames you gather, then the more dinosaur encyclopedia you can get!
